ul.li: Revue historique et chronologique des événements mémorables de la guerre dans la Péninsule .. [microform]= Chronological and historical retrospect of the memorable events of the war in the Peninsula : from the embarkation of the Prince Regent of Portugal to the Brazils and the imprisonment of the King of Spain in France / collected and anexed [sic] as a supplemental addition to William Bradford's Views, &c.

Esquisse du pays, du caractère et du costume, en Portugal et en Espagne, prises pendant la campagne et durant la marche de l'armée angloise, en 1808 en 1809 .. [microform]= Sketches of the country, character, and costume, in Portugal and Spain, made during the campaign, and on the route of the British army, in 1808 and 1809 / engraved and coloured from the drawings by William Bradford ; with incidental illustration, & appropriate descriptions, of each subject.
